author: Michael Roberts
title: Michael Carter, R.I.P.: Remembering a Denver Comedy-Scene Favorite
text:
Michael Carter. Courtesy photo Denver blog posts appreciate the contributions of local originals.
At our Arts blog, Byron Graham marks the passing of Michael Carter , a local stand-up comedian who died at the shocking age of 31.
Related Stories Wanted: A Brewery for DIA's New Hotel Denver Infill's Ken Schroeppel offers the first update of the Le Meridien/AC Hotel project in central downtown .
The Ralphie Report's live thread of the CU-Arizona State game is even sadder to read days after the game than it was in real time.
Contact: Michael Roberts Follow: Michael Roberts Westword Westword
